socklog-unix.enable: [ ! -e /etc/sv/socklog-unix/log ] && socklog-conf unix nobody log || echo ""; tmp_file=/etc/sv/socklog-unix/log/main/main/config; echo "s999999" > $tmp_file; echo "n11" >> $tmp_file; TMP_RUNLEVELS="single multi"; [ -f /var/log/syslog ] || ln -s /var/log/socklog/main/current /var/log/syslog;
